title: And the Sea Shall Give Up Its Dead
description: Hypnotia sinks a Russian nuclear submarine with all hands on board. A year later, the submarine surfaces near Scotland with its entire crew transformed into radioactive zombies loyal to the Mandarin.

title: Rejoice! I Am Ultimo Thy Deliverer
description: Mandarin, Modok, and Justin Hammer revive an ancient and powerful robot named Ultimo. They develop a device to control it and send it on a mission to capture Iron Man.

title: Data In, Chaos Out
description: The stock markets crash after a massive failure in a military early warning system. Mandarin and Modok are using the crisis for profit and manage to brainwash Jim Rhodes into turning again Iron Man.

title: Silence My Companion, My Death Destination
description: Madarin uses Julia's daughter Rachel to lure Iron Man into a trap. In order to rescue her, Iron Man needs to overcome a serious power supply problem. Meanwhile, the military accepts a new tank design from Stark Enterprises.

title: The Grim Reaper Wears a Teflon Coat
description: Stark Enterprises developed an advanced stealth jet called "the Grim Reaper" for the American military. When Modok's minions steal the jet for the Mandarin, Iron Man must recover it.

title: Enemy Within, Enemy Without
description: When the Mandarin sends his men to steal an experiment boat developed by Stark Enterprises, the endangers the life of Modok's wife Alana. Modok approaches Iron Man in an attempt to protect her.

title: Origin of the Mandarin
description: After the Mandarin attacks one of Star Enterprises oil drills, Spider-Woman discovered a mysterious black box which seem to reveal the Mandarin's life story.

title: The Defection of Hawkeye
description: After the Mandarin makes a precise attack against a shipment from Stark Enterprises, the heroes of Force Works begin to suspect Hawkeye of being a traitor.

title: Iron Man to the Second Power: Part 1
description: M.O.D.O.K. creates a robotic copy of Iron Man and uses it to frame the real Iron Man of biological terrorism.

title: Iron Man to the Second Power: Part 2
description: Force Works tries to locate the real Iron Man while also trying to stop his duplicate from spreading a deadly plague.

title: Origin of Iron Man: Part 1
description: After an attack by the Mandarin and Fing Fang Foom, Iron Man is trapped in a glacier. Tony remembers his past in order to keep warm while the suit repairs itself.

title: Origin of Iron Man: Part 2
description: After a cave-in, Tony continues to examine his memory banks. He recalls when he first made the Iron Man armor while in the clutches of the Mandarin.

title: The Wedding of Iron Man
description: Tony and Julia get married. Unfortunately, Mandarin may have figured out that Tony Stark is Iron Man.

title: The Beast Within
description: Mandarin plots with Justin Hammer and Fing Fang Foom to steal Iron Man's armor and take over the world. Fing Fang Foom, however, has other ideas.

title: Fire and Rain
description: War Machine is injured during the test of a new defense system. Firebrand takes credit for the sabotage.

title: Cell of Iron
description: A.I.M. (Advanced Idea Mechanics) takes credit for a terrorist attack in China. Iron Man goes into space to investigate and discovers a mysterious space station called the "Star Well" guarded by the powerful Sunturion.

title: Not Far from the Tree
description: With the help of Iron Man, S.H.I.E.L.D. tracks a transmission from A.I.M. It leads them to a still living Walter Stark, Tony Stark's father. Meanwhile, A.I.M. hires the Crimson Dynamo in order to infiltrate Stark Enterprises.

title: Beauty Knows No Pain
description: Julia Carpenter and other Stark employees are trapped after a cave-in in Egypt. Tony discovers that Madame Masque is responsible. She wants Iron Man to gain access to the Golden Sepulcher of Isis in order to repair her disfigured face.

title: Iron Man, on the Inside
description: After an attack from Ultimo, Iron Man shrinks down to microscopic size in order to save Hawkeye's life. The Hacker endangers the mission when he takes control of H.O.M.E.R. and sends Ultimo after Iron Man.

title: Distant Boundaries
description: Iron Man heads to the distant planet Elysian where he must help in the fight against Dark Aegis.

title: The Armor Wars: Part 1
description: After stopping an attempted coup, Tony discovers that secret Stark technology was being used by Crimson Dynamo. Feeling responsible for the misuse of his technology, Star decides to put an end to all other armored warriors in the world.

title: The Armor Wars: Part 2
description: Iron Man continues his efforts to disable all other armored warriors. His reputation sinks to new lows when he begins to target fellow heroes. Meanwhile, Justin Hammer unleashes his robot Firepower in order to eliminate Stark Enterprises.

title: Empowered
description: M.O.D.O.K. locates one of the Mandarin's missing power rings and uses it to try to find the others. The Mandarin tracks down M.O.D.O.K. in order to take the ring for himself.

title: Hulk Buster
description: Iron Man and Dr. Bruce Banner work together to recover one of the Mandarin's rings. Before they can do so, the Leader steals the ring because he believes that he can use it to undo the accident that created the Hulk.

title: Hands of the Mandarin: Part 1
description: Having reacquired his ten rings, the Mandarin announces his attention to take over the world and return it to a pre-technological state. Iron Man must reunite Forceworks in order to stop him.

title: Hands of the Mandarin: Part 2
description: The Mandarin captures Iron Man and the rest of Forceworks. He plans to use their life forces to power the Heart of Darkness so that he can shut down all technology on the planet.
